hackathon-description-text: HackTX is a place to grow. Challenge yourself to learn something, break something, or create something. Whether you are a computer prodigy or a complete beginner, HackTX is for you. Join us for one intense weekend where you will push the limits, make new friends, and build great things!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: CEO, Future X Labs, Vobi, UT Crew

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: When students (or companies) must innovate quickly, it is important to jump in and try multiple options before choosing the best solution. The National Instruments Rapid Prototyping Award will be given to teams that demonstrate collaborative effort to evaluate alternatives when they encounter problems during the hackathon. "Do the simplest thing that could possibly work." "Make it run, make it right, make it fast." These are the mantras of rapid prototyping.

Winners will receive Amazon gift cards AND the chance to win a trip to NYC for MongoDB World 2016. The winning team from each hackathon we sponsor this year will be entered to win a trip for their team to our annual user conference MongoDB World (
Build a project targeted towards non-profit social good (as listed on
The best parody UT app (as picked by RotMan), will win a dinner with dinner with RotMan and Bill Gates*.
The most technically challenging hack, as picked by a16z, will receive an RC racecar.
